writer.name: David F. Oyster David F. Oyster

director.name: David F. Oyster David F. Oyster

introduction: From the Pacific Ocean's rugged coastline to the autumn splendor of the Adirondacks, Mexico's colossal canyon to British Columbia's majestic peaks, North America offers some of the most spectacular and breathtaking scenery in the world. Traveling on uniquely engineered railway lines while visiting picturesque and less traveled areas, this series uncovers the remarkable natural beauty and rich history of this continent. So climb aboard for the most incredible rail adventures the United States, Canada and Mexico have to offer!
